patch 8.2.2389: test failure on a few systems

Problem:    Test failure on a few systems.
Solution:   Avoid that "char" value is negative.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/57d5a01cb45d6edb16c3835a49b42d6d8fc0163e|patch 8.2.2388: no easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value>
patch 8.2.2388: no easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value

Problem:    No easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value.
Solution:   Add v:numbermax and v:numbermin.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2388: no easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value · vim/vim@57d5a01
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2388: no easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value · vim/vim@57d5a01
attachments.text: Problem: No easy way to get the maximum or mininum number value. Solution: Add v:numbermax and v:numbermin.

patch 8.2.2387: runtime type check does not mention argument index

Problem:    Runtime type check does not mention argument index.
Solution:   Add ct_arg_idx. (closes #7720)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2387: runtime type check does not mention argument index · vim/vim@e32e516

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f904133e1a5ea84a124d3ece12b1f0a7392f1ca7|patch 8.2.2386: Vim9: crash when using ":silent! put">
patch 8.2.2386: Vim9: crash when using ":silent! put"

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using ":silent! put".
Solution:   When ignoring an error for ":silent!" rewind the stack and skip
            ahead to restoring the cmdmod. (closes #7717)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2386: Vim9: crash when using ":silent! put" · vim/vim@f904133

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e71996bd0865659bde5450f466bc3e53e83431b2|patch 8.2.2385: "gj" and "gk" do not work correctly when inside a fold>
patch 8.2.2385: "gj" and "gk" do not work correctly when inside a fold

Problem:    "gj" and "gk" do not work correctly when inside a fold.
Solution:   Move check for folding. (closes #7724, closes #4095)
